summary: Replaces the main menu music with a sweet 8bit version.
descriptionHtml:
Hello!

This mod replaces the main screen music with a sweet 8-bit version. Get nostalgic!

Listen to it here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nVABQuSAm1s&feature=plcp&context=C36098dfUDOEgsToPDskKzA5iZgVcBYzA4vrOMR6uQ

Music by: DC28. Check out his other 8-bit music here: http://www.youtube.com/user/DerChaot28/featured


Installation:
Use Nexus Mod Manager, or extract to Data folder. The music file should be in music/special/


Mod made using Skyrim Sound Tools: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6986

Mod by Chow
author: Chow
